thread.title: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp set for £150MILLON summer spending spree with Inaki Williams, Tiemoue Bakayoko, Virgil van Dijk and Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain top of German’s wishlist
thread.title_full: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp set for £150MILLON summer spending spree with Inaki Williams, Tiemoue Bakayoko, Virgil van Dijk and Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain top of German’s wishlist

author: gsweet
title: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp set for £150MILLON summer spending spree with Inaki Williams, Tiemoue Bakayoko, Virgil van Dijk and Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain top of German’s wishlist
text:
EFL MONEY TO BURN Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp set for £150MILLON summer spending spree with Inaki Williams, Tiemoue Bakayoko, Virgil van Dijk and Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain top of German’s wishlist 
Anfield chief to splash cash on squad capable of dealing with high-intensity tactics as fitness guru warns boss may need to renew HALF his side every two years Exclusive 11th March 2017, 10:30 pm Updated: 11th March 2017, 10:50 pm
